mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portfolio( portfolio_id, portfolio_userId, portfolio_title, portfolio_bCat, portfolio_sCat, portfolio_thumbUrl, portfolio_Img, portfolio_content, portfolio_price, portfolio_term, portfolio_regDate ) VALUES( #{portfolio_id}, #{portfolio_userId}, #{portfolio_title}, #{portfolio_bCat}, #{portfolio_sCat}, #{portfolio_thumbUrl}, #{portfolio_Img}, #{portfolio_content}, #{portfolio_price}, #{portfolio_term}, #{portfolio_regDate} );
